A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Absolutely loved this film. I don't care what everyone else has to say about its flaws (it's by no means perfect) the good far outweighs the bad. The plot is solid\, the cinematography is spectacular and quite frankly this is one of the best Star Wars films ever released. Yes\, there is some filler\, yes\, some of the characters are slightly wasted and yes I can take or leave porgs but this was a thoroughly spectacular film and I left the cinema feeling entertained and thirsty for episode IX.
